sentence.Network_en: Such attitudes are the product of woeful ignorance.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样的态度是极度无知造成的。

sentence.Network_en: She displayed a woeful ignorance of the rules.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对这些条例表现出可悲的无知。

sentence.Network_en: Stroeve gave me a look with his woeful eyes.
sentence.Network_cn: 施特略夫用他那对愁苦的眼睛瞪了我一眼.

entry.tran: （人或事物）悲惨的，忧伤的，哀伤的
entry.def: If someone or something is woeful, they are very sad.

entry.tran: 恶劣的;糟糕的;不合意的
entry.def: You can use woeful to emphasize that something is very bad or undesirable.

example.ex: Such attitudes are the product of woeful ignorance.
example.tran: 这样的态度是极度无知造成的。

means.word_mean: 1. affected by or full of grief or woe;

sentences.sentence: "his sorrow...made him look...haggard and...woebegone"- George du Maurier

means.word_mean: 2. of very poor quality or condition;

sentences.sentence: "deplorable housing conditions in the inner city"
